title: (x) Script for R. Molinari 'Authentic Italian Recipes' - La Portenia {Mike Y}
content:
hi there... does anyone have suggestions for a similar font as seen below? i would greatly appreciate it..

comments.content: Reminds me of Ale Paul's scripts. Can figure out which one.

You're right Tiff, it's [La Portenia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016065736/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/la-portenia/)

- Mike Yanega
Wow, you guys are awesome. Thank you for taking the time to respond! :)
